sqlMap.select:
select * from SYS_ITEM
IS_DELETED = #isDeleted#
TYPE = #type#
SUB_TYPE = #subType#
C_GENDER != #gender#
order by ID;

select * from SYS_ITEM s where s.P_SUITABLE in ( SELECT si.NAME FROM PLAYER_ITEM pi left outer join SYS_ITEM si on pi.item_id=si.id where pi.USER_ID=#userId# and pi.PLAYER_ID=#playerId# and si.TYPE=1 and ( (pi.UNIT_TYPE=1) or (pi.UNIT_TYPE=2 and pi.DURABLE>0 ) or (pi.UNIT_TYPE=3 and pi.QUANTITY > 0) or (pi.UNIT_TYPE=4 and pi.EXPIRE_TIME >= now()) ) and pi.IS_DELETED="N" group by NAME) and s.IS_DELETED = "N" and s.TYPE = 3 and s.SUB_TYPE = #subType# order by ID;
select count(*) from SYS_ITEM si where si.TYPE = #type# and si.SUB_TYPE = #subtype# and si.IS_DELETED='N' and si.P_SUITABLE like concat('%',(select name from SYS_ITEM si where si.ID=#id#),'%');

select * from SYS_ITEM si where si.TYPE = #type# and si.SUB_TYPE = #subtype# and si.IS_DELETED='N' and si.P_SUITABLE like concat('%',(select name from SYS_ITEM si where si.ID=#id#),'%') limit #start#, #step#;

select si.* from ( select sp.* from SYS_PACKAGE sp left outer join SYS_ITEM si on si.ID=sp.PACKAGE_ID where sp.PACKAGE_ID = #value# and si.IS_DELETED='N' ) p
left outer join SYS_ITEM si on si.ID=p.ITEM_ID where si.IS_DELETED='N';
sqlMap.delete:
update SYS_ITEM set IS_DELETED=#isDeleted#
where ID=#id#;
sqlMap.insert:
insert into SYS_ITEM( ID , NAME, DISPLAY_NAME, RESOURCE_STABLE, RESOURCE_CHANGEABLE, TYPE, SUB_TYPE, CURRENCY, UNIT_TYPE, COST1, UNIT1, COST2, UNIT2, COST3, UNIT3, LEVEL, MODIFIED_DESC, W_ID, W_CHANGE_IN_TIME , W_MOVE_SPEED_OFFSET, W_CROSS_OFFSET, W_ACCURACY_DIVISOR, W_ACCURACY_OFFSET, W_MAX_INACCURACY, W_PENETRATION, W_DAMAGE, W_RANGE_MODIFIER, W_FIRE_TIME, W_RELOAD_TIME, W_ZOOM_TIME, W_ZOOM_VALUE, W_AMMO_ONE_CLIP, W_AMMO_COUNT , W_AUTO_FIRE , W_TIME_TO_IDLE , W_NORMAL_OFFSET , W_NORMAL_FACTOR , W_ONAIR_OFFSET , W_ONAIR_FACTOR , W_MOVE_OFFSET , W_MOVE_FACTOR , W_NORMAL_UP_BASE , W_NORMAL_LATERAL_BASE , W_NORMAL_UP_MODIFIER , W_NORMAL_LATERAL_MODIFIER , W_NORMAL_UP_MAX , W_NORMAL_LATERAL_MAX , W_NORMAL_DIR_CHANGE , W_MOVE_UP_BASE , W_MOVE_LATERAL_BASE , W_MOVE_UP_MODIFIER , W_MOVE_LATERAL_MODIFIER , W_MOVE_UP_MAX , W_MOVE_LATERAL_MAX , W_MOVE_DIR_CHANGE , W_ONAIR_UP_BASE , W_ONAIR_LATERAL_BASE , W_ONAIR_UP_MODIFIER , W_ONAIR_LATERAL_MODIFIER , W_ONAIR_UP_MAX, W_ONAIR_LATERAL_MAX , W_ONAIR_DIR_CHANGE , W_CROUCH_UP_BASE, W_CROUCH_LATERAL_BASE , W_CROUCH_UP_MODIFIER , W_CROUCH_LATERAL_MODIFIER , W_CROUCH_UP_MAX , W_CROUCH_LATERAL_MAX , W_CROUCH_DIR_CHANGE , W_UP_MODIFIER ,
W_SHOOT_BULLET_COUNT,W_SPREAD,W_FIRE_MAX_SPEED,W_FIRE_START_SPEED,W_FIRE_ACELERATION,W_FIRE_RESISTANCE,
W_STAB_TIME , W_STAB_LIGHT_TIME , W_STAB_HURT , W_STAB_LIGHT_HURT, W_EXPLODE_TIME , W_READY_TIME , W_THROW_OUT_TIME , W_HURT_RANGE , W_HURT , C_SIDE , C_GENDER , C_ID, P_SUITABLE, DESCRIPTION, I_BUFF_ID, I_ID, W_RANGE_START, W_RANGE_END, W_ACCURACY_TIME, W_ACCURACY_TIME_MODIFIER, W_MAX_ACCURACY, W_MIN_ACCURACY, W_CROSS_LENGTH_BASE, W_CROSS_LENGTH_FACTOR, W_CROSS_DISTANCE_BASE, W_CROSS_DISTANCE_FACTOR,
W_X_OFFSET, W_SIGHT_NORMAL_OFFSET,W_SIGHT_ONAIR_OFFSET,W_SIGHT_MOVE_OFFSET, W_STAB_DISTANCE,W_STAB_LIGHT_DISTANCE,W_STAB_WIDTH,W_BACK_FACTOR, W_FLASH_RANGE_START,W_FLASH_RANGE_END,W_FLASH_BACK_FACTOR,W_TIME_MAX,W_TIME_FADE,W_TIME,
W_MAX_LENGTH, I_VALUE ) values( #id#, #name#, #displayName#, #resourceStable#, #resourceChangeable#, #type#, #subType#, #currency#, #unitType#, #cost1#, #unit1#, #cost2#, #unit2#, #cost3#, #unit3#, #level#, #modifiedDesc#, #wId#, #wChangeInTime#, #wMoveSpeedOffset#, #wCrossOffset#, #wAccuracyDivisor#, #wAccuracyOffset#, #wMaxInaccuracy#, #wPenetration#, #wDamage#, #wRangeModifier#, #wFireTime#, #wReloadTime#, #wZoomTime#, #wZoomValue#, #wAmmoOneClip#, #wAmmoCount#, #wAutoFire#, #wTimeToIdle#, #wNormalOffset#, #wNormalFactor#, #wOnairOffset#, #wOnairFactor#, #wMoveOffset#, #wMoveFactor#, #wNormalUpBase#, #wNormalLateralBase#, #wNormalUpModifier#, #wNormalLateralModifier#, #wNormalUpMax#, #wNormalLateralMax#, #wNormalDirChange#, #wMoveUpBase#, #wMoveLateralBase#, #wMoveUpModifier#,
#wMoveLateralModifier#, #wMoveUpMax#, #wMoveLateralMax#, #wMoveDirChange#, #wOnairUpBase#, #wOnairLateralBase#, #wOnairUpModifier#, #wOnairLateralModifier#, #wOnairUpMax#, #wOnairLateralMax#, #wOnairDirChange#, #wCrouchUpBase#, #wCrouchLateralBase#, #wCrouchUpModifier#, #wCrouchLateralModifier#, #wCrouchUpMax#, #wCrouchLateralMax#, #wCrouchDirChange#, #wUpModifier#,
#wShootBulletCount#,#wSpread#,#wFireMaxSpeed#,#wFireStartSpeed#,#wFireAceleration#,#wFireResistance#,
#wStabTime#, #wStabLightTime#, #wStabHurt#, #wStabLightHurt#, #wExplodeTime#, #wReadyTime#, #wThrowOutTime#, #wHurtRange#, #wHurt#, #cSide#, #cGender#, #cId#, #pSuitable#, #description#,#iBuffId#,#iId#, #wRangeStart#, #wRangeEnd#, #wAccuracyTime#, #wAccuracyTimeModefier#, #wMaxAccuracy#, #wMinAccuracy#, #wCrossLengthBase#, #wCrossLengthFactor#, #wCrossDistanceBase#, #wCrossDistanceFactor#, #wXOffset#, #wSightNormalOffset#, #wSightOnairOffset#, #wSightMoveOffset#, #wStabDistance#, #wStabLightDistance#, #wStabWidth#, #wBackFactor#, #wFlashRangeStart#, #wFlashRangeEnd#, #wFlashBackFactor#, #wTimeMax#, #wTimeFade#, #wTime#, #wMaxLength#, #iValue# );
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
sqlMap.update: update SYS_ITEM set NAME=#name#, DISPLAY_NAME=#displayName#, RESOURCE_STABLE=#resourceStable#, RESOURCE_CHANGEABLE=#resourceChangeable#, TYPE=#type#, SUB_TYPE=#subType#, CURRENCY=#currency#, UNIT_TYPE=#unitType#, COST1=#cost1#, COST2=#cost2#, COST3=#cost3#, UNIT1=#unit1#, UNIT2=#unit2#, UNIT3=#unit3#, LEVEL=#level#, MODIFIED_DESC=#modifiedDesc#, W_ID=#wId#, W_CHANGE_IN_TIME=#wChangeInTime#, W_MOVE_SPEED_OFFSET=#wMoveSpeedOffset#, W_CROSS_OFFSET=#wCrossOffset#, W_ACCURACY_DIVISOR=#wAccuracyDivisor#, W_ACCURACY_OFFSET=#wAccuracyOffset#, W_MAX_INACCURACY=#wMaxInaccuracy#, W_PENETRATION=#wPenetration#, W_DAMAGE=#wDamage#, W_RANGE_MODIFIER=#wRangeModifier#, W_FIRE_TIME=#wFireTime#, W_RELOAD_TIME=#wReloadTime#, W_ZOOM_TIME=#wZoomTime#, W_ZOOM_VALUE=#wZoomValue#, W_AMMO_ONE_CLIP=#wAmmoOneClip#, W_AMMO_COUNT =#wAmmoCount#, W_AUTO_FIRE =#wAutoFire#, W_TIME_TO_IDLE =#wTimeToIdle#, W_NORMAL_OFFSET =#wNormalOffset#, W_NORMAL_FACTOR =#wNormalFactor#, W_ONAIR_OFFSET =#wOnairOffset#, W_ONAIR_FACTOR =#wOnairFactor#, W_MOVE_OFFSET =#wMoveOffset#, W_MOVE_FACTOR =#wMoveFactor#, W_NORMAL_UP_BASE =#wNormalUpBase#, W_NORMAL_LATERAL_BASE =#wNormalLateralBase#, W_NORMAL_UP_MODIFIER =#wNormalUpModifier#, W_NORMAL_LATERAL_MODIFIER =#wNormalLateralModifier#, W_NORMAL_UP_MAX =#wNormalUpMax#, W_NORMAL_LATERAL_MAX =#wNormalLateralMax#, W_NORMAL_DIR_CHANGE =#wNormalDirChange#, W_MOVE_UP_BASE =#wMoveUpBase#, W_MOVE_LATERAL_BASE =#wMoveLateralBase#, W_MOVE_UP_MODIFIER =#wMoveUpModifier#, W_MOVE_LATERAL_MODIFIER =#wMoveLateralModifier#, W_MOVE_UP_MAX =#wMoveUpMax#, W_MOVE_LATERAL_MAX =#wMoveLateralMax#, W_MOVE_DIR_CHANGE =#wMoveDirChange#, W_ONAIR_UP_BASE =#wOnairUpBase#, W_ONAIR_LATERAL_BASE =#wOnairLateralBase#, W_ONAIR_UP_MODIFIER =#wOnairUpModifier#, W_ONAIR_LATERAL_MODIFIER =#wOnairLateralModifier#, W_ONAIR_UP_MAX =#wOnairUpMax#, W_ONAIR_LATERAL_MAX =#wOnairLateralMax#, W_ONAIR_DIR_CHANGE =#wOnairDirChange#, W_CROUCH_UP_BASE =#wCrouchUpBase#, W_CROUCH_LATERAL_BASE =#wCrouchLateralBase#, W_CROUCH_UP_MODIFIER =#wCrouchUpModifier#, W_CROUCH_LATERAL_MODIFIER =#wCrouchLateralModifier#, W_CROUCH_UP_MAX =#wCrouchUpMax#, W_CROUCH_LATERAL_MAX =#wCrouchLateralMax#, W_CROUCH_DIR_CHANGE =#wCrouchDirChange#, W_UP_MODIFIER =#wUpModifier#, W_SHOOT_BULLET_COUNT=#wShootBulletCount#, W_SPREAD=#wSpread#, W_FIRE_MAX_SPEED=#wFireMaxSpeed#, W_FIRE_START_SPEED=#wFireStartSpeed#, W_FIRE_ACELERATION=#wFireAceleration#, W_FIRE_RESISTANCE=#wFireResistance#, W_STAB_TIME =#wStabTime#, W_STAB_LIGHT_TIME =#wStabLightTime#, W_STAB_HURT =#wStabHurt#, W_STAB_LIGHT_HURT =#wStabLightHurt#, W_EXPLODE_TIME =#wExplodeTime#, W_READY_TIME= #wReadyTime#, W_THROW_OUT_TIME= #wThrowOutTime#, W_HURT_RANGE= #wHurtRange#, W_HURT =#wHurt#, C_SIDE =#cSide#, C_GENDER =#cGender#, C_ID=#cId#, P_SUITABLE =#pSuitable#, DESCRIPTION=#description#, I_BUFF_ID=#iBuffId#, I_ID=#iId#, IS_DELETED=#isDeleted#, W_RANGE_START=#wRangeStart#, W_RANGE_END=#wRangeEnd#, W_ACCURACY_TIME=#wAccuracyTime#, W_ACCURACY_TIME_MODIFIER=#wAccuracyTimeModefier#, W_MAX_ACCURACY=#wMaxAccuracy#, W_MIN_ACCURACY=#wMinAccuracy#, W_CROSS_LENGTH_BASE=#wCrossLengthBase#, W_CROSS_LENGTH_FACTOR=#wCrossLengthFactor#, W_CROSS_DISTANCE_BASE=#wCrossDistanceBase#, W_CROSS_DISTANCE_FACTOR=#wCrossDistanceFactor#, W_SHOOT_BULLET_COUNT=#wShootBulletCount#, W_SPREAD=#wSpread#, W_FIRE_MAX_SPEED=#wFireMaxSpeed#, W_FIRE_START_SPEED=#wFireStartSpeed#, W_FIRE_ACELERATION=#wFireAceleration#, W_FIRE_RESISTANCE=#wFireResistance#, W_MAX_LENGTH=#wMaxLength#, I_VALUE=#iValue#, W_X_OFFSET=#wXOffset#, W_SIGHT_NORMAL_OFFSET=#wSightNormalOffset#,W_SIGHT_ONAIR_OFFSET=#wSightOnairOffset#,W_SIGHT_MOVE_OFFSET=#wSightMoveOffset#, W_STAB_DISTANCE=#wStabDistance#,W_STAB_LIGHT_DISTANCE=#wStabLightDistance#,W_STAB_WIDTH=#wStabWidth#,W_BACK_FACTOR=#wBackFactor#, W_FLASH_RANGE_START=#wFlashRangeStart#,W_FLASH_RANGE_END=#wFlashRangeEnd#, W_FLASH_BACK_FACTOR=#wFlashBackFactor#,W_TIME_MAX=#wTimeMax#,W_TIME_FADE=#wTimeFade#,W_TIME=#wTime# where ID=#id#;
